text:
If you love travelling, HDFC Bank Regalia Gold is your best friend! Why? It gives you...​

⭐ Complimentary Club Vistara Silver Tier and MMT Black Elite Membership​
✈️ Redeem reward points against Global Flights, Hotel stays and Airmiles​
🏨 Marriott vouchers every quarter*​
💺 Up to 12 complimentary lounge access*​

Celebrate this #WorldTourismDay with the best lifestyle credit card.​

To know more, visit https://t.co/rijrSXQxPo

#HDFCBank #Bank #Cards #DebitCards #WorldTourismDay #Tourism #CreditCard #PremiumCard #Travel

text:
In these uncertain times, we are doing our bit to help #SimplifyLife for you.
We have deployed HDFC Bank #MobileATM across 50 locations in India.
HDFC Bank works with local authorities to identify & reach areas that have limited banking facilities.
